key_quotes: I've been back and forth with legal. I ask them to please help me out, to do this, to do that.
My group just changed their procedure just because the cost got astronomical to have a legal team review everything.
Let's try to make this happen. I'll have to make sure so we can put that.
If you can help me putting that and maybe we can review together, that would be great.
